bug.author: realBjornRoden
bug.summary: Incorrect link to the mentioned book in the README.rst file
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The link to the mentioned book seem to be incorrect at the end of the file <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/blob/v0.10.x/README.rst>https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/blob/v0.10.x/README.rst</denchmark-link>
Should probably be <denchmark-link:https://d2l.ai/d2l-en.pdf>https://d2l.ai/d2l-en.pdf</denchmark-link> but is <denchmark-link:http://en.diveintodeeplearning.org/>http://en.diveintodeeplearning.org/</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/realBjornRoden>@realBjornRoden</denchmark-link> many thanks for letting us know. I fixed the link just now and will port the fix to other release branches.
Close because it has been fixed in the v0.x branch.
